summary: Makes all NPCs in the game have fixed stats and realistic health
descriptionHtml:
[left]I'm tired of NPCs having high health even if played with combat overhauls, I want it all to come down to player skill in battle. Even with combat overhauls, if the enemy's level is higher than yours you'll probably get 1 hit ko'ed while it'll take many hits to kill them. With this mod everyone will be fair in terms of HP. I made health dependent on Races, you can make suggestions in balancing health.

[list]
[*]Nord 100 HP
[*]Dunmer 100 HP
[*]Altmer 100 HP
[*]Bosmer 100 HP
[*]Orsimer 125 HP
[*]Argonian 150 HP
[*]Khajiit 100 HP
[*]Redguard 100 HP
[*]Breton 100 HP
[*]Imperial 100 HP
[*]Falmer 100 HP
[*]Troll 300 HP
[*]Dragon Priest 1200 HP
[*]Giant 500 HP
[*]Spriggan 200 HP
[*]Old People 90 HP
[*]Werewolf 200 HP
[*]Skeleton 100 HP
[*]Draugr 100 HP
[*]Dremora 150 HP
[*]Hagraven 150
[*]Mammoth 650 HP
[/list]              etc.

This mod edits NPCs classes and races.

I recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33395]SkyTweak by Grimy Bunyip[/url] to balance the game for combat
It is also recommended to be used on a new save because changes will not be made to NPCs discovered ingame

I recomend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/?]Elys Uncapper[/url] and set health per level up to 0

I also recommend using combat overhauls and dragon overhauls for more punishment

Well, I just made this mod for myself and decided to share if maybe somebody else wanted a similar thing for their game
I hope you enjoy using this, game might be easier or HARD.[/left][center][/center]Credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49373/?]Automation Tools by Mator[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit by ElminsterAU[/url]!
author: Akuichi
